value.title: StarCraft 2: AI vs AI - Epic Pro Bots Tournament Match!
value.excerpt: Game of StarCraft 2 from the ProBots tournament. This match does not feature two humans that play against each other, instead it is a game between two custom made AIs (artificial intelligence). The gameplay reminds me a lot of Google's AlphaStar, but with far more APM.  Pro Bots YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@ProBotsAI
